meta.name: description
meta.content: Welcome to Butler School District 53, a public K-8 school district located in Oak Brook, IL. The school community strives to provide enriching and engaging educational experiences that propel each and every student to new heights every day.

h3.a: April 17 Letter to Families and Staff

div.p: Dear Butler School District 53 families and staff, As you’ve likely seen in the news, today Governor Pritzker has ordered all public and private K-12 schools to remain closed for the remainder of this academic year. The Governor’s decision is in the best interest of our students, families, and staff. My heart aches for students and staff who will not be together to finish out the school year.

h3.a: Social Emotional Newsletter No. 1 - Establishing Healthy Routines

div.p: One of the most helpful things you can do to support your child at home during this uncertain time is to Establish Healthy Routines. While so much in our lives is unpredictable at this time, we can try to make some things predictable for our children. Setting up a daily schedule that outlines predictable routines can help to reduce stress and conflict at home.

The Butler School District 53 Board of Education will hold a public hearing on the proposal for an e-Learning program recommended in lieu of emergency days, for implementation district-wide commencing school year 2020-2021.
Please find public access/participation to audio instructions by visiting the District website's virtual meeting page at: https://www.butler53.com/boe/virtual-meetings&nbsp...
Please find public access/participation to audio instructions by visiting the District website's virtual meeting page at: https://www.butler53.com/boe/virtual-meetings&nbsp...

p.em: "To provide the best educational opportunities for each student to achieve academic excellence, to develop the curiosity for life-long learning, and to demonstrate personal and social integrity."
